{{{
加密文件 - gpg -e -r <uid> <filename>

解密文件 - gpg <filename>

生成密钥 - gpg --gen-key

gpg --list-keys / -k

gpg --list-secret-key / -K

gpg --export <uid> -a > <filename.asc>

gpg --import <filename.asc>

gpg --delete-keys <uid>

gpg --delete-secret-keys <uid>

gpg --sign-key <uid>
}}}
